transport.question: I have wheels and go 'vroom vroom!' What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 I can be red, blue, or any color!
👪 I can take you to Grandma's house.
🛣️ You see lots of me on the road.

transport.question: I float on the water and carry people. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I go in the ocean.
⚓️ I'm bigger than a duck, I carry lots of people.
🛳️ Sometimes I have a horn that goes 'toot!'

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take you far away. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am up, up in the sky!
💺 You sit inside me, and I have wings.
✈️ I take you to different countries.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 👧 You use your feet to move me.
⛑️ You wear a helmet when riding me.
🚲 I am fun to ride in the park.

transport.question: I am big and yellow, and take kids to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I stop to pick up children.
🚌 Many children can ride on me.
🚦 I have flashing lights and signs.

transport.question: I go on tracks and can carry many people in a city. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 I might go underground.
⚡ I use electricity to move.
🚃 People use me to get to work.

transport.question: I’m a house on wheels where people can live and travel. What am I?

hints.text: 🏕️ People can camp in me.
🍳 I have a small kitchen inside.
🏠 I'm like a home that can move.

transport.question: I help put out fires, and I have a loud siren. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I have a ladder on top.
🧑‍🚒 Firefighters ride me.
💧 I spray water to stop the fire.

transport.question: I carry astronauts into space. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I can go really, really high!
👩‍🚀 People wear special suits when inside me.
🪐 I travel to the moon and beyond.

transport.question: I’m like a train, but I go very fast and only have a few stops. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I am super speedy!
🇯🇵 I am popular in Japan.
🚄 I travel between big cities.

ocean.question: I swim in the sea and say 'glub, glub'. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I'm small and colorful!
🌊 I live in the water.
🐡 Some of my friends have bubbles.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I'm not very fast.
🏡 I carry my house on my back.
🐚 You can find my home on the beach.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have more arms than you!
🎨 I can change colors to hide.
💧 I squirt ink when I'm scared.

ocean.question: I am big and blue, and boats sail on me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am made of water.
🐳 Many animals live in me.
🗺️ You can find me on a map.

ocean.question: I have a hard shell and swim slowly in the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I like to eat seaweed.
🟢 My shell is often green.
🏖️ I lay my eggs on the beach.

ocean.question: I am a very large animal that lives in the ocean and spouts water. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am a mammal, not a fish!
🌊 I am the biggest animal on Earth.
🌬️ I breathe air through a hole on my head.

ocean.question: I have a pointy nose and many sharp teeth. People are scared of me!

hints.text: 🦈 I am a type of fish.
⚔️ I am a predator.
🌊 I have a fin on my back.

ocean.question: I have a long body and I shock things in the water. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I am a type of fish.
🐍 I look like a snake
⚠️ I use electricity to hunt.

ocean.question: I'm an animal that looks like a star and lives on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I'm not a real star, but I look like one.
🖐️ I usually have five arms.
🏖️ You can sometimes find me on the beach.

ocean.question: I'm a very small sea creature that makes a home of a shell. What am I?

hints.text: 🦀 I borrow my home from someone else
🐚 I like to live in shells others have abandoned.
🚶 I walk along the sea floor.
